abstract.p: A pair of teams coming off big weekend sweeps will square off Tonight at Citizens Bank Park, where the Philadelphia Phillies welcome the Arizona Diamondbacks for the start of a three-game series.

body.content.p: (Sports Network) - With the Philadelphia Phillies picking up momentum after their three-game sweep of the Atlanta Braves, and the Arizona Diamondbacks capturing all four of their games against the Houston Astros, tonight's game at Citizen Bank Park looks set to be a clash of the Titans.
